attributes.action: Stop Rangers from buying/relocating and destroying Bury Football Club
attributes.additional_details:
Glasgow Rangers are discussing buying Bury Football Club... re-locating them to Glasgow and re-naming them Rangers Football Club of Glasgow.  This would enable Rangers to enter the English League and is legal.

Bury Football Club is a League One team for a small town with plenty of supporters.  It is a historic team that was formed as part of the Football League.  This move would destroy a local football team.

It must be stopped at all cost to prevent this move from happening in the future and stop struggling larger clubs from taking advantage of the small clubs to their own gain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities (the FA, the Football League, the SFA and SPL).
